---
name: Company Submission
about: Submit a new company or update an existing listing
title: '[Submission] Company Name'
labels: submission
---

## Instructions

1. Use the [submission form](https://wagov-dtt.github.io/defencewest-site/submit/)
2. Click "Download ZIP" to generate your submission file
3. Attach the ZIP file to this issue
4. Submit the issue

**What happens next:**
- A GitHub Actions workflow will process your submission automatically
- A pull request will be created with your company data
- You'll receive a comment on this issue with the PR link to review
- The PR will be reviewed by the Defence West team and merged if approved

**Note:** No need to add information to this issue description - everything is in the ZIP file.
